document.full_text: asia needs to work to ensure the potential of its economic and political rise is realized, including fulfilling its responsibilities as a global player, the asian development bank said ahead of its annual meeting next week in vietnam.
document.title: bright asian future not pre-ordained, must be earned: adb
lines_and_colors: asia needs to work to ensure the potential of its economic and political rise is realized, including fulfilling its responsibilities as a global player, the asian development bank said ahead of its annual meeting next week in vietnam.
